articles.title: Nike shares fall 10% as China sales plunge, tariffs hit profits
articles.summary: Nike posted fiscal second-quarter earnings and revenue that topped Wall Street's expectations as CEO Elliott Hill tries to turn around the company.

articles.title: Trust these numbers? Economists see a lot of flaws in delayed CPI report showing downward inflation
articles.summary: Thursday saw the release of a much lighter-than-expected inflation report for November, and economists are already questioning its significance.

articles.title: November consumer prices rose at a 2.7% annual rate, lower than expected, delayed data shows
articles.summary: Economists polled by Dow Jones expected CPI to have risen 3.1% on an annualized basis.

articles.title: Bank of England cuts interest rates, in welcome Christmas boost for consumers
articles.summary: The Bank of England voted to cut interest rates from 4% to 3.75% in its last monetary policy move of 2025.

articles.title: November's inflation report is the first to be released after the shutdown. Here's what to expect
articles.summary: November's CPI report is expected to show the annual inflation rate at 3.1%, according to economists polled by Dow Jones.
